title: Moon+ Reader Pro v2.6.8 Build3 latest build nov 12

Ã¢Ëœâ€ The key features:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support online ebook libraries and personal calibre ebook server.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Read local books with smooth scroll and tons of innovation.

Ã¢Ëœâ€ Standard functions:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Full visual options: line space, font scale, bold, italic, shadow, alpha colors, fading edge etc.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 10+ themes embedded, includes Day & Night mode switcher.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Various types of paging: touch screen, volume keys or even camera, search or back keys.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 24 customized operations (screen click, swipe gesture, hardware keys), apply to 15 customized events: search, bookmark, themes, navigation, font size and more.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 5 auto-scroll modes: rolling blind mode; by pixel, by line or by page. Real-time speed control.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adjust the brightness by sliding your finger along the left edge of the screen, gesture commands supported.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Intelligent paragraph; indent paragraph; trim unwanted blank spaces and lines options.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Keep your eyes health options for long-time reading.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Real page turning effect with customized speed/color/transparent; 5 page flip animations.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ My Bookshelf design: Favorites, Downloads, Authors, Tags; self bookcover, search, import supported.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Justified text alignment, hyphenation mode supported.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dual page mode for landscape screen.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support all four screen orientations.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ EPUB3 multimedia content support (video and audio), popup footnote support
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Backup/Restore options to cloud via DropBox, sync reading positions between phones and tablets.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Highlight, Annotation, Dictionary (Offline or Online, support ColorDict, GoldenDict, Fora, ABBYY Lingvo, etc.), Translation, Share functions all in moon+ ebook reader.
